definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.
sentences.chinese: 數量龐大的軍隊已經被高技術軍隊取代。

sentences.english: Zhongguanchun is home to China's hi-tech industry and more than ten famous universities.
sentences.chinese: 中關村是中國高技術產業和十多所著名大學的所在地。

sentences.english: The company has high-tech equipment management personnel, equipment, technology, constantly updated.
sentences.chinese: 公司擁有高技術的設備管理人員，設備技術不斷更新。

sentences.english: We have work all thought the ages wit out Hi-tec .
sentences.chinese: 在高技術形成之前我們已經實踐過很久很久了。

sentences.english: In recent years, DNA micro-array technology gets a rapid development.
sentences.chinese: 基因芯片技術是近幾年來迅速發展的生物高技術。

sentences.english: Stimulus measures aim to balance spurring the economy with not sacrificing hi-tech upgrading.
sentences.chinese: 刺激措施意在平衡促進經濟，同時不犧牲高技術升級。

sentences.english: High technology artificer fabrication, stardard cementation, effect is also very satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 高技術的技工，正規粘結，效果也是很滿意的。

sentences.english: C4ISR system is the key to high-tech wars.
sentences.chinese: 指揮自動化系統是打贏高技術戰爭的關鍵。

sentences.english: The milk fibre underwear is a high-tech product with a feeling of a bosom friend.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶纖維內衣，高技術產品，貼身新感受。

sentences.english: The high-tech industry, the mortgage industry, and the real estate industry had all paved their own path to destruction.
sentences.chinese: 高技術產業，抵押貸款業，房地產業奠定了自毀之路。

sentences.english: The computer simul is typicing of high technology products.
sentences.chinese: 計算機仿真是典型的高技術產品。

sentences.english: The team with great co-work spirit, and with great technology and high relatives .
sentences.chinese: 是一支以團隊精神爲核心的高技術隊伍。

sentences.english: But he added that some of the most significant work still requires high-tech facilities.
sentences.chinese: 但是他說其中一些最重要的工作仍然需要高技術設備。

sentences.english: The seamless pipe is produced as high additional value product.
sentences.chinese: 無縫管擔當起開發高技術高附加值產品的重任。

sentences.english: Finally, using the linear weighted method, the value evaluating the credit state of high-tech enterprise is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 最後，運用線性加權法獲得高技術企業的信用評價值。

sentences.english: The propaganda media in high-tech warfare have become the inner components of warfare.
sentences.chinese: 高技術戰爭中宣傳媒體已經成爲戰爭的重要組成部分。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
